page.title: 19Trip to SB House.
page.content: used to own and live in the house in 1871.We and Mrs Pearce shook hands with Snowball and Mr Liffney.He was around forty years old and Mr Snowball was seventy years old.He now lives in Scotland.We walked around to the front doors and took some still pictures of Mr Snowball and the surrounding area.Then we videoed Mr Snowball and Mr Liffney together.They invited us into the house to show us some oil paintings of the house.Mr Lifton (the present owner) is trying to get the house back to its original way.He gave us permission to walk around the grounds.We went through to the front garden which had flowers,trees and a large lawn.The grounds at the back of the house were different. They had natural woodland with flower beds.There was a paved area with a barbeque set up and garden furniture.Close by was an
